TopicTitle: MacJeb Rendezvous Autopilot not turning on.

Articles.Content:
I am trying to dock my Apollo style Mun rocket's command module to the lander. I go to the Rendezvous Autopilot setting, make the docking port on the lander the target, turn on RCS, click "Control from here" on the Command Module's docking port, but when I hit "Engage Autopilot" It turns on then in the blink of an eye turns off and wont turn on. I first thought it was the fact the mods version had to be updated to the latest version of KSP (Steam edition if that makes a difference), so I updated the mod and everything else works perfectly fine except that Rendezvous Autopilot.

What am I doing wrong here people?
You need to use Docking Autopilot. Rendezvous autopilot is for when you're in a different orbit.
I realized that after I posted this
